website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's top-of-the-line Galaxy can compete with a laptop with its high-def display and surround sound.
pros: The proprietary stylus, the S Pen, is included
It's compatible with DeX, Samsung's software for creating a laptop experience on a tablet
cons: Runs Android Oreo, a slightly outdated mobile OS, but it's slated for a free upgrade to Android Pie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
customer_reviews.text: Screen refresh causes weird jelly effect on screen. My £50 Amazon Fire tablet had this issue but I did not expect it on a tablet of this price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Samsung out-manuvered by MS greed.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful tablet. Comparable to laptop but much smaller, lighter. Samsung must be praised for finally bringing out a tablet with 128GB internal and an SD slot and a good sized screen. But how completely stupid to design a screen size which doesn't qualify for free basic MS software. The snag is MS's small print that Office software (free to tablets 10.1 in screens) isn't free to 10.5 in screens. This is an error on Samsung's part not negotiating effectively with MS. I don't want to pay 5.99 or 7.99 a month to use MS office 365 when it isn't fully compatible with MS Office 2010 on my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Bill365

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased that the S5E supercedes the Tab 4 and is cheaper and better. I didnt want the pencil/pen thing anyhow, so this is ideal. I understand there might be a follow-up S5 model, but this one is what i want anyhow. Doesn't come with a cover, so you should order one. I put a 256GB SD card in this and it works nicely. Screen is excellent and sound great too for movies. Battery life good. My only quibble is that it comes with loads of useless Samsung crapware installed, some things you can uninstall or disable but many of the Samsung core apps CANNOT BE STOPPED OR REMOVED. THis is most annoying. Hey, but all makes do this :-/
customer_reviews.author: Clinicalobeast

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge with previous Samsung leads
customer_reviews.text: I like this tablet, it's fast and the battery charges really quickly. However, you need an adaptor (supplied) to use headphones as there's no headphones jack point. Also the tablet has a different connection for charging so only the lead supplied can be used. Although these seem like minor points they start to become a nuisance pretty quickly. I buy Samsung tablets because the leads were interchangeable so annoyed this is no longer the case. Hence the 3 stars overall
customer_reviews.author: Mags4Trikes

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, nice and light and quickly loads web pages, had a samsung tab S2 and much prefer this model, there was a cash back offer on this but after several attempts gave up trying..........
customer_reviews.author: John Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very neat configuration
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it my first pad was another Samsung several years old ,I have had two other makes Samsung is still the best
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bagnall

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my new tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Went for the biggest version which wasn't cheap (hence only 4 star for value).....but, if it last like my Tab S (the 1st version of this tablet which I've had for 4yrs+ & only needed to upgrade as the storage was getting an issue), then it will be excellent value for money. It's fast, the screen is great & the most up to date android is nice to have. It is thin & light. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: N.Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Just not good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's got a nice screen and it's light. It has a fingerprint scanner and everything else you expect from a tablet. I got this to replace my Sony Z2 tablet which I've had for years. After using it a short while I didn't have bothered. I think my old z2 is much better build quality. This S5 tab is not waterproof so you can't use it in the bath. The processing speed is comparable to my old Z2 so it feels a bit worthless. There are others with more novelty features, on reflection I think that the tablet with a projector built in would have been a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet with very good screen quality and superior sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet which is a replacement for a 2014 edition Samsung tab. I am very impressed with the sound quality compared to my older model and the screen quality is excellent. Takes good photos too. I mainly use it for web browsing and games but it would work very well for watching films etc. It is very slim and lightweight. I was also pleased to receive a £40 cashback from Samsung which made it an even better buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wightwick

customer_reviews.title: Light, quick and it came in gold
customer_reviews.text: My old tablet died so I needed a new one. After a little research I decided on the Samsung S5e. Having used it for a day, there are differences with my old Samsung tablet (tab 10 pro) but they're good differences. It's much easier to open multi apps and change between them. This device is lighter and easy to hold but I don't think you can add a cover for extra protection. Uploading is the same and quicker but restrictions on notification tones limit some customisation. Overall very happy with it but time will tell whether I will feel this way in the future. Would have loved to get a pale blue device but they don't do that colour.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Research didn't tell me this.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is rubbish, but in an obscene way that would get the comment deleted. It's a bit better than the 4 year old s2 tab I replaced and it's 4 years old. The screen is beutiful and the sound is even better, the buttons are pop up ones at the bottom of the screen, it's still not been perfected, i keep going back to home. Sorry, i know for the price it looks the best, it may be, but the others must have 1mah batteries. Such a shame, its fantastic other than those two points.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing android tablet
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to fault this tablet. I've been using it for nearly a month and am having trouble justifying ever using a laptop again. Great screen. Films on full HD with great blacks and vibrant colours. Sounds great too. The quad speakers give really good stereo, reasonable bass and good volume. Touch sensitive. Yup that's really good too. Processing power. REALLY good. Playing high level games that used to be on PC. USB. Charging, phones, whatever. Really good. But the absolute iPad killer is the expansion port. Unlike an iPad, I've just dropped a half terabyte micro SD for storage. Oh and it's really good for work. And it weighs less than some sandwiches I've bought. Buy one quickly!
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Well specified
customer_reviews.text: It was a steep learning curve after Windows, though it gradually fell into place. Used mainly for storing holiday pictures taken with a very versatile compact camera. The large additional storage of this tablet gives me an adequate backup if I were to lose the images on the cameras SD card. In addition the wide range of apps available allow me to use it for navigation, email and surfing the web, while away from my desktop. It seems to be stable and reliable and the available apps quite enough for my needs. Good screen and adequate battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is fast. The sound is brilliant when you turn on Dolby Atmos in the settings. In fact I was blown away by the sound using Dolby Atmos. Really great screen, nice and bright and colourful. Very sharp. And it's a surprisingly lightweight tablet. Even with arthritis I have no problem holding it for long periods. Well worth the money especially with the £50 discount at the moment. It doesn't have a headphone socket but there's an adaptor in the box to connect headphones thru the USB C connector which works
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet overall
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice tablet overall but there are a few shortcomings. One is the screen which, as others mentioned, has a low refresh rate which cases a weird effect when swipping up and down. The second is the battery it is big but not as durable as I'd like, specially when web browsing. The biggest surprise for me was the sound quality, the 4 speakers make it amazing, absolutely 5 stars. The screen, apart from the refresh rate is a nice one. The One UI from Samsung can sometimes be a few points below other Android UIs and Android Stock.
customer_reviews.author: JReviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've never really been a fan of the whole Apple inbred ecosystem. The flexibility to choose different manufacturers using the same OS has really been my plus for Android based systems. Honestly this tablet is fantastic for its price. I'm so glad I choose wisely and ditched the old Apple one. Now all my devices are Android. 👌👍
customer_reviews.author: Dilly Donk

customer_reviews.title: Unbeaten value
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life for such a high performance device. The cost savings have been in the screen itself, not that the quality has suffered but is not compatible with the Samsung Stylus. Considering it's over 100 cheaper than a model which does, are you really going to miss the Stylus that much? If you really do want one you can use any 3rd party stylus you want.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: Good buy - UK version not a problem
customer_reviews.text: UK version turns out to be limited to the AC plug being of the type used in the UK which doesn't matter much since the tablet can be charged in many other ways. I miss being able to charge it wirelessly though. The 6GB RAM 128 GB internal memory is highly recommendable; I inserted another 128 GB SD card and will have sufficient memory capacity for a long time to come - and I can always replace it with an even larger SD card. Remember to chose the sim card enabled version to be independent of (unsafe) WiFi when you're away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Per Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant device.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tablet for my 4 year old and I am not content with these slow kids devices, so after some research bought this. It's fantastic, it's quick, responsive, the sound is excellent. I was particularly drawn to it for the Samsung kids home feature and it's very good for this. I was concerned about WiFi problems after reading some reviews, but no such problems on my device. If I was getting this for me I probably would have upgraded to the higher ram but it's excellent for my son to watch YouTube on.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Owers

customer_reviews.title: A good medium range choice
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this is the best tablet I have used. Before buying, I read a number of reviews criticising the display, and suggesting that this was caused by an unacceptable display rate - whatever that entails?! My experience, admitedly after only 2 weeks use, would obviously contradict this view. As far as I am concerned, this tablet strikes a good medium balance between more basic models and the high end range.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tablet to follow along and annotate university lectures. Initially I was disappointed when I realised that a pen wasn't supported to help writing (my mistake for not checking!), but found one (Homder) that works with it pretty okay. The samsung software is brill - fast and looks aesthetically good. Supports all the apps I needed it for. A perfect portable size. Been really useful and would definitely reccommend. Just watch out if you're looking for something to write on as probably not the best model for that...
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn, Leeds

customer_reviews.title: Flawless design
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tablet I have ever owned it’s fast - responsive - beautiful design and ultra light with Dolby surround sound built in. Along with the the picture quality is amazing and so is the 13mp camera that comes with it. The stuff you can do on this tablet far surpasses most over tablets and at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay attention to review do your own research
customer_reviews.text: So I got this table 2 weeks ago despite all the bad reviews as I had a S3 and wanted to upgrade. The whole "Jelly effect" and "frame issue" I have not noticed, I used this to play Hearthstone and watch Now TV and Netflix and never seen a single issue with the screen or refresh rate. The battery is amazing and lasts sooooo long the only bad point I have is despite the price you do not get a set of earphones or the Pen, come on even the S3 had both and it cost less. To sum up ignore amazon reviews and do your own research before buying as this is a bad fine tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Drutoo

customer_reviews.title: Wanted an upgrade from Galaxy Tab A
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine Jan 19, after moving from my old but excellent Galaxy A Tab. This tablet is a step up from the A Tablet for these reasons: Smoother screen interface. Incredibly thin and light. Lovely screen image. Processor power better. Better reaction to typing Very easy set up .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a good few months and still love this tablet . Absolutely amazing tablet , great storage with an SD card slot for more. I can watch multiple different file formats compared to my old tablet and the quality of the screen is great. It's really good for studying with as I can use apps on it like Linux academy. If you want a tablet to watch stuff on the go I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SwiftJay

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but go for 6gb ram version
customer_reviews.text: My mom is loving it it’s so light and the screen resolution is amazing for a tablet speakers are so nice and camera is good for a tablet but I’m not really sure about the ram of the system it’s 4gb option and 6gb so if you buying this for gaming go for 6gb because it’s faster and gaming is so much smoother on it but personally I think if they put 6gb version and 8gb version it’s going to be much better for this resolution ram options are so low
customer_reviews.author: mr x

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Drops out
customer_reviews.text: Useless, hold it in landscape mode more than a few feet from the router and the WiFi drops out. Reported fault if you Google it. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet - great picture & sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet - screen and speakers are amazing. I've only had iPads before and was wary of stepping away from them - but for the spec you get with this tablet at this price - I couldn't not buy it. And I don't regret it. It's handled everything I've thrown at it with ease - plus has expandable memory for extra storage. It looks great with small bevels and is amazingly thin - with a metal back. Great tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my old Nexus 7 (for which there is no replacement). Other phones are Samsungs - so decided for the bigger format. So far so good - responsive, big clear screen, good battery life, and heaps of storage. But heavier than the Nexus 7 so means you need to employ more tablet stands for general use than I needed for the smaller tablet. But we move with the times I guess ...
customer_reviews.author: Notozman

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung product as always
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product as always from Samsung! Beautiful, light and sturdy design and easy to use for study and entertainment and the battery lasts long even after watching YouTube. Sound is absolutely amazing quality and when you listen to your music, you will enjoy it in full. This tablet has also a sim card slot that is another great feature as it serves as a phone for you, too.
customer_reviews.author: Elitsa Borisova

customer_reviews.title: Overall great experience, better than a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit! Only slight bugbear is that I get enfuriated when trying to pause a film when watching Netflix, the screen seems unresponsive for ages...having said that...might be an issue with the Netflix app rather than the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Very slick
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is a very smooth operation. No hassle. Does just what you want. Good battery life. Lots of features to help. Big improvement on predecessors and they were good. Can't recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Good overall but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Battery life not as good as I expected but the product is very good overall. Getting used to not having fixed buttons takes a little getting used to but it's better once done. Decent screen. Facial recognition doesn't seem to recognize me which is odd since my Samsung Galaxy S8 phone has no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Poor WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet with a nice screen but very poor Wi-Fi if you hold the tablet in a certain manner it drops the WiFi connection so when I am using it I sometimes have to use it in portrait mode. This problem from researching is a hardware problem that cannot be solve by software upgrades Samsung is aware of the problem but has done nothing as far as pricing and recall. This tablet should not be sold for no more than £150.00 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: What a terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was required. Super quality, great picture, easy to use. What more to say other than delighted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Nice & light
customer_reviews.text: good product. Excellent screen & very responsive but advise protective cover being so thin & light. Choose the infiland cover
customer_reviews.author: william powell

customer_reviews.title: A great Tablet high end performance.
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy Tab 5e is great. At first sight it looks smaller than 10.5“ but that is not the case. It is also very slim compared to other tablets. The face recognition works well to open the tablet. It is very fast with a clear and sharp screen. I am delighted with it and would not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan DC

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tablet for media consumption.
customer_reviews.text: This is for me the perfect tablet, it's wide-screen, it has fantastic speakers and a fantastic screen. The dolby atmos is superb, surround sound on a tablet! I only use mine for Internet and video, Netflix, amazon prime etc and for me it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Marks

customer_reviews.title: brilliant tablet, amazing screen
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from.a 2016 Tab A a.d wow what a difference, the screen is the best ive ever seen on a a talet including apple, very quick browsing and all the games ive tried run very well. I never rate any tablet camera but any photos imported from a good android phone look amazing. So the jelly wobble people mention I have none of, it runs very smooth so maybe they updated software??! Overall highly recommended and cheaper that the s4 s6 s7
customer_reviews.author: richard legg

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just upgraded from my old S2 and see a vast difference already. Was easy to set up, and transfer data and files from my old tablet. Impressed with the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Nulli Secundus

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet, TERRIBLE DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: All good but abit annoyed on delay with prime delivery and decrease in price after my order. No problems so far with the device. Also the delivery driver was 7hrs late and the rudest driver I have EVER experienced!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: First time tablet user - love it, girl friend has a Galax Tab A
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to search on line and use app's than on my phone. Android operating system - just like my Samsung phone. Battery life is very, very impressive when in sleep mode. My Brother has just got one the same on my recommendation, albeit with £50 cashback, Check Curry's PC World and Argos).
customer_reviews.author: Stuart D

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement on my old S2, but slow internet connection
customer_reviews.text: Lovely screen. Very fast processor. Lots of storage, even without inserting a SD card. It seems to have a slower internet connection than the S2. I don't know why - removing it from the case doesn't help. It's a personal preference, but I also preferred the portability of an 8 inch tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wright-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Screen Light Bleed on Tab S5e
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Tab S5e today and set it up this evening. On doing so I noticed really bad light bleed. On the right handside if watching in landscape. I took a picture and compared it to the Tab S4. You can see the difference in the pictures. Hoping Samsung can replace this. Apart from that Samsung tablets are very good at what they do.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe N Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 128GB Version
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Have to admit was influenced by my Samsung Galaxy Note 8 phone but this is brill in its own right. Quite light and so slim. Easy to set up and use. It's Galaxy for me in future too.
customer_reviews.author: Chateaulady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet as I was mainly using my phone to read news item and browse the web. This tablet has an excellent screen and gives me a far better experience of the items I view. It was not the most expensive or the latest version but in my opinion a very good all rounder at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J Page

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet for the price. They should have made it a bit thicker and put a headphone jack in. All companys need to understand if a product is 2mm thicker to leave the headphone jack in its absoloutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Tablet that is good to take.
customer_reviews.text: Avery clear screen and of a good size. So much more satisfying to use than the Apple equivalent , with the distinct advantage that it operates in android. The sound quality is also very impressive, with a reasonable base quality. I bought two, one for my wife as w8.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bernard E. Mcguire

customer_reviews.title: £100 cashback my arse.
customer_reviews.text: My Tab S2 battery was finally shot and memory running low. This is a great replacement. But three stars for the misleading £100 cashback offer. I should have paid more attention to the small print. You will not get £100 off.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, lacks horsepower for CPU intensive tasks
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tablet for the money, screen is simply amazing and sound quality is excellent. It's lost a star as it won't export 4k video when video-editing (my OnePlus 7 had no issue), so I'm assuming it's the CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Spaldin

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for watching movies and TV when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, superb screen, really enjoy watching content on this. Replacement for a lenovo Tab4 bought 2 years previously, this is a far better implementation of Android than that was.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lakey

customer_reviews.title: Nice tab
customer_reviews.text: This is a very capable tablet. I bought the 64Gb model from Amazon Warehouse and got a very good deal. I added a 256Gb MicroSD card for storage which is essential if you plan to store videos or lots of images.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous409

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third one of these. The first stopped charging, the second stopped responding to screen touch and so far, the third one is okay. This is a disgrace for a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: DrTeeth

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it is Samsung at its best. Ipad eat your heart out
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Android Tablet and I am very please with the screen and sound resolution. Easy to use with great potential to modify it for your own preference.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dominic Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: good tablet
customer_reviews.text: tablet is thin and light weight, easy to use and very responsive, good picture and sound quality. bought this to face time family during lockdown and it done the job brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: Katescoots

customer_reviews.title: New version
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a six-year-old Samsung. So far so good. Good screen and sound. Battery life much better than my previous tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Trypsin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tablet with fast processor and sufficient ram to run smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Cannot really fault it. Had Tab A previously which although OK lacked sufficient ram to run smoothly without constant restarts. This tab has no such issues... But it shouldn't for 3 x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doggycop

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to set up and sync with phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived inPolish, instructions in Polish had to get help to set it up. Could not get it to sync with galaxy s7. Icons all changed,cable different size. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: S. Irving

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet well happy, and the Dolby Atmos sounds amazing
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: No faults
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest tablet I have owned. Have not experienced any of the negatives highlighted in previous reviews. The screen is spectacular. The sound is amazing for such a small device.
customer_reviews.author: N. Beard

customer_reviews.title: A nice tablet, very clear screen.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Samsung tablets before and have been very pleased with them, this one doesn't disappoint. Very easy to connect to the internet and Bluetooth. Very sharp and clear screen. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Timms

customer_reviews.title: One Great tablet at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent..bought mainly for TV / film reply when on move. Excellent screen, very crisp, and a better aspect ratio than an iPad for widescreen meaning less lost to letterboxing.
customer_reviews.author: JurorNumber8, UK

customer_reviews.title: nice one
customer_reviews.text: working good, have no bugs or problems Of course is 400£ from samsung amd I had no problems with it in the last 8 months so is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Silviu Anghelache

customer_reviews.title: very very good
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect and works so well with my note 10+ the picture is the best i have seem and the sound is very good to out of 10 i would give it 10+
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: Super tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great value tablet fast and impressive features , make sure you get a case that does not block the fingerprint scanner
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S5e
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to give a big review. So far so good. Fairly easy to set up. Not too sure about the charger as can only use the one it came with and no other usb eg: Not micro usb as can damage unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Amazing screen. Fast (no lag on anything). Good sound. Good price. Why buy a £600 iPad when this is so much better?
customer_reviews.author: Jij

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tablet, everything is top class and it's a great looking tablet too, really thin and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Super amoled screen.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic, tablet. It's got Dolby atmos. It's super amoled screen. Great for music and movies. And very light to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Monteith

customer_reviews.title: My new Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tablet, took a while to get the hang of using it, a lot different than my old Sansung tablet, good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Globee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. I've had Apple stuff, and really can't get on with it. This tablet is thin, light, strong and lightning fast.. the aluminium back is gorgeous too!
customer_reviews.author: DaveBoy

customer_reviews.title: Had WiFi issues and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: The problem I had was WiFi connectivity. If I held the tablet a certain way the WiFi cutout. So sent back.
customer_reviews.author: hal9000

customer_reviews.title: nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd tablet from samsung , Upgraded every time , I like ease of use and trusted brand name ,Would recomend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leonard Kneale

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money now.
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, great media playback. The SOC isn't that slow and plays any game / emu that I want. 6gb of ram makes multi-tasking a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Just an everyday Dad

customer_reviews.title: Its value for money! What's not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. It's a lightweight machine with a host of apps to suit every taste, a good screen, very light touch. Meets all my requirements. Delivery - two days ahead of schedule - excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Angus MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Great for movies.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the hate android tablets gets. Amazing screen and 4 speakers. It's a portable cinema.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Very light, excellent screen and very responsive. Bought for day to day use. Handles everything. Upgraded the memory with 512gb sd card, tablet handles movies, pictures, movies and apps stored on the sd very well. Fantastic tablet at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pirrie

customer_reviews.title: Samsung after sales is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Samsung refused to honour the cashback despite claiming correctly. This makes the product overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: kkc

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fast and great screen.
customer_reviews.text: Been a Sony user for some years but having changed to a Samsung phone and pleased with it's performance thought I'd replace my tablet with a Samsung device and very pleased with it too.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Pinnington

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly balanced

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e 64G Wifi Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:UK Version| Size Name:64GB| Colour Name:Black| Configuration:Wi-FiSamsung Galaxy Tab S5e Wi Fi SM-T720 64GB Black UK Version - MAIN CAMERA Single 13 MP, f/2.0, 26mm, 1/3.4", 1.0µm, AF, Features: LED flash, HDR, panorama, Video 2160p@30fps, SELFIE CAMERA: Sin+BC30gle 8 MP, f/2.0, 26mm, 1/4.0", 1.12µm, Video 1080p@30fps
feature_bullets: Lightweight design to keep you comfortably connected to what you enjoy most. At 5.5mm thin and weighing around 400g, Galaxy Tab S5e is light enough to comfortably stay with you
Design that matches your sense of style. Galaxy Tab S5e features a polished metal unit-body case design in a sophisticated metal finish
View only what you want, when you want it. With One UI, Galaxy Tab S5e minimizes display clutter by curating content that is most relevant to you
Get more out of the content you love to watch. Galaxy Tab S5e features a vivid 10.5 inch AMOLED display that delivers stunning colour reproduction and optimal screen brightness levels
Featuring a Quad Speaker system sound by the AKG, Galaxy Tab S5e lets you listen to your favourite music with rich, true-to-life sound

specifications.Series: Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e 64G Wifi Black
